Posts.Content: Thanks Karen - I think you are right, it is very tough for some people who have both cancer and diabetes. Hopefully our new booklet will help to make things a bit easier for them. Best wishes richard
Posts.Title: Diabetes and Cancer Treatments

Posts.Content: Hello Michele Thank you for posting. And for sharing your insights. It does sound like it can be a tough time trying to manage the two illnesses at the same time.  I am still in the process of collating all the great tips and advice that people are sharing, but may come back to yo if i have any questions - if that's OK? Hope your last chemo goes well. BW, Richard
Posts.Title: Diabetes and Cancer Treatments

Posts.Content: Thanks Jo - I hope everything goes well with the oncologist. BW Richard
Posts.Title: Diabetes and Cancer Treatments

Posts.Content: Thanks Jo I guess the things that would be most helpful are the little tips that help you cope with any side effects during treatment. May be the advice your diabetes nurse gives you. Anything you think helpful really! I hope that the chemotherapy goes well - and that you don't have any issues with your diabetes. BW, Richard
